drcl
Class Debug

java.lang.Object
  drcl.Debug
public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods for other classes to output debug and error messages.

Constructor Summary
Debug()
           
 
Method Summary
static void debug(java.lang.String msg_)
          Outputs a debug message.
static void error(java.lang.Object msg_)
          Outputs an error message.
static void error(java.lang.Object msg_, boolean exit_)
          Outputs an error message.
static void error(java.lang.Object where_, java.lang.Object msg_)
          Outputs an error message.
static void error(java.lang.Object where_, java.lang.Object msg_, boolean exit_)
          Outputs an error message.
static void fatalError(java.lang.String msg_)
          Outputs an error message and exits the program.
static void systemFatalError(java.lang.String msg_)
          Outputs a system-error message and exits the program.
